gobblin.runtime

Class TaskState

  • java.lang.Object
    • gobblin.configuration.State
      • gobblin.configuration.WorkUnitState
        • gobblin.runtime.TaskState
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Writable

    public class TaskState
extends WorkUnitState
    An extension to WorkUnitState with run-time task state information.
